```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
data<-read.csv("eqarchive-en.csv")
data$X.1 <- 1
head(data)
```

```{r}
library(RgoogleMaps)
library(plotly)
library(dplyr)
fig <- data %>% plot_ly( 
    lat = ~latitude,
    lon = ~longitude,
    marker = list(color = "fuchsia"),
    type = 'scattermapbox') 
fig <- fig %>%
  layout(
    mapbox = list(
      style = 'open-street-map',
      zoom =2.5,
      center = list(lon = -88, lat = 34))) 

fig
```
